title: Arcade - Movie Database
description: A modern movie database website with dynamic search, detailed movie pages, trending sections, and smooth UI interactions inspired by IMDb and TMDB.

title: SacVille - Fullstack Bag Store
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform for purchasing bags with authentication, cart functionality, admin controls, and secure backend integration.

title: erec.io - Personal LLM
description: A personal Large Language Model interface with markdown rendering, conversational memory, and AI-powered responses integrated via external LLM API.

title: Macintosh - macOS Inspired Portfolio
description: A macOS-inspired interactive portfolio website featuring draggable windows, custom dock, terminal interface, and smooth animations.

title: Harley-Davidson Animated Website
description: A high-performance animated clone of the Harley-Davidson website featuring scroll-triggered animations, cinematic transitions, SVG effects, and immersive user interactions.
